author: cms-sw
body: Currently bot was using the release name to enable multi-arch builds. In order to support multi-arch in default builds (e.g 14.1.X), this PR adds `MULTIARCH_OPTS` config flag. This can be set to enable multi-arch builds for any IB. For now  `config.map` is updated to enable MULTIARCH_OPTS for special MULTIARCH, SKYLAKE IBs
title: Instead of using release name to enable multiarch use MULTIARCH_OPTS config option
